title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m37a - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m37a
					1 vgl. dazu die Einleitung zu William James, TheThing and its Relations, RE S. 92: "Experience in its immediacyseems perfectly fluent. The active sense of living whichwe all enjoy, before reflection shatters our instinctiveworld for us, is self-luminous and suggests noparadoxes. Its difficulties are disappointments anduncertainties. They are not intellectual contradictions."
